itunes:title: Episode 373 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/22/19 - Live From The AFC Championship!
title: Episode 373 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/22/19 - Live From The AFC Championship!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Kansas City as the Chiefs took on the Patriots.  Dan's soul gets filled up with sweet joy as the Chiefs lose.  We also break down the NFC Championship winner and what the NFL needs to correct about overtime r...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Kansas City as the Chiefs took on the Patriots.  Dan's soul gets filled up with sweet joy as the Chiefs lose.  We also break down the NFC Championship winner and what the NFL needs to correct about overtime rules and late penalties.  Special guest Kansas City sports host GAT joins to chat about her city and of course we bring on some Missouri Chapter Drinkin' Bros!  Someone eats an edible live on air. 

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Kansas City as the Chiefs took on the Patriots.  Dan's soul gets filled up with sweet joy as the Chiefs lose.  We also break down the NFC Championship winner and what the NFL needs to correct about overtime rules and late penalties.  Special guest Kansas City sports host GAT joins to chat about her city and of course we bring on some Missouri Chapter Drinkin' Bros!  Someone eats an edible live on air.
